ecfg

Encrypted secrets in JSON, YAML, or TOML

Auxiliary

README, LICENSE

Manuals

ecfg(1)
manage application secrets via encrypted config
ecfg-encrypt(1)
encrypt an ecfg file
ecfg-decrypt(1)
decrypt an ecfg file
ecfg-keygen(1)
generate a new keypair for use with ecfg
ecfg(5)
JSON, YAML, or TOML file with asymmetric-key-encrypted values
